page.title: 07LOCAL THOUGHTS
page.content: As can be seen from the previous few pages, there are many sporting or recreational facilities in the area. The questionnaire that we completed by asking local people (see page 19 ) how much they used these facilities shows that, apart from the village hall, it is mainly people from outside our area that use them. The fishing ponds , riding school , and particularly the water-sports centre were not used much by locals , but were nevertheless very busy indeed at this time of year. The village hall was extremely well used by the majority of the local population of all ages. The vast variety of events and functions held there justify the cost of replacing the old hall with the new one.
